name: BinHex 4.0 Encoded File
summary: An HQX file is an encoded text file created by BinHex, a binary-to-text encoding system available for Classic Mac OS. It contains data that has been compressed and encoded from an 8-bit binary format into a 7-bit text format. The HQX format is useful for transferring binary images, documents, and multimedia as text in email attachments.
